Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3
- ATK & DEF 130%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*When HP is 66% or less*
- ATK & DEF 66%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*For every attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +1 (up to +6)
- {passiveImg:forever}Chance of evading enemy's attack 6%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 66%)
*Per "Universe 6", "Joined Forces" or "Pure Saiyans"
Category ally on the team*
- ATK 10%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is a "Universe Survival Saga" or "Pure Saiyans"
Category enemy*
- Launches an additional Super Attack

Leader Skill.Name: Two Makes the Strongest of All Universes

4627.superDescription:
Raises DEF, raises ATK for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

4628.superDescription:
Raises DEF, causes mega-colossal damage 
to enemy and lowers ATK

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
